newsitem.title: UK: FHLB ADDS $50 MILLION TO FIVE-YEAR BOND.
newsitem.headline: FHLB ADDS $50 MILLION TO FIVE-YEAR BOND.

text.p: The following bond has been increased to $250 million from $200 million, sole lead manager Paribas Capital Markets said.
The deal was launched on Monday.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 11.AUG.97
FULL FEES 20 BP REOFFER PAR SPREAD =
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ SEMI-ANN
S&P AAA DENOMS (K) NO DEF SALE LIMITS UK
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ YES

MGT/UND 5 BP SELL CONC 15 BP PRAECIPUUM =
